Package ch.unige.ng.statistics

Interface Summary
Statistic<T,S extends GlobalIndividual> n-genes

This interface gives the definition of a statistic that is done on a population
 

Class Summary
BestPrinter<T extends GlobalIndividual> n-genes
BestStatistic<T extends GlobalIndividual> n-genes
CacheHitStatistic<T extends GlobalIndividual> This statistic calculates the number of cache hit that have been calculated from the beginning.
CacheSize<T extends GlobalIndividual> A statistic that the returns the number of value in the cachingObject that are cached.
CacheSizeStatistic<T extends GlobalIndividual> This statistic returns the number of individual in the population cache.
CacheStatistic<T extends GlobalIndividual> This statistic is used to return the number of cache hit that happened from the beginning of the execution.
DifferentStatistic<T extends GlobalIndividual> Shows the percentage of different individual in the population

If we have 1 1 1 3 3 2: the result will be 0.5
DisruptiveCrossover<S,T extends GlobalIndividual<S>> This class is used to see the statistics of a crosover.
EverBestStatistic<T extends GlobalIndividual> n-genes
GenerationCacheHitStatistic<T extends GlobalIndividual> This statistic the number of cache hit that happened at last generation.
GenotypeStdStatistic<T extends Number,S extends GlobalIndividual<T>> Calculates the standard deviation of each gene on the population and sum it.
